
```{r}
if(!"tinytex" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages("tinytex")

tinytex::install_tinytex()

if(!"rmarkdown" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages("rmarkdown")

if(!"prereg" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages("prereg")


```	
```{r}
# Create new COS preregistration challenge R Markdown file
rmarkdown::draft(
  "my_preregistration.Rmd"
  , "cos_prereg"
  , package = "prereg"
  , create_dir = FALSE
  , edit = FALSE
)

# Render document
rmarkdown::render("my_preregistration.Rmd")

```
